ActorTalk: Have you talked to Rhea yet? How did it go?
That's excellent. Based on Rhea's current condition, I've prepared a treatment plan. In the early stages of therapy, we can try using items that might trigger her memories, gently guiding her along.
Whenever Rhea mentions the Astral Canopy in Sequence Square, she smiles without knowing. Taking a close-up photo of its projection might help her remember something.
According to Rhea's old habits, whenever she went to the surface, she would always bring a drink from Kuroro Coffee. The familiar taste might also awaken certain memories...
To help Rhea recover her memories, I wrote some special "stories" for her. They might come in handy now. I'll go print these stories out in a bit.
[PlayerName], would you mind gathering the two items I just said? Let's meet back here shortly.
It seems she's willing to open up to me.
Is there anything I can do to help?
